name: Boson
tagline: A C++ framework for asynchronous I/O and light threads scheduling
body:
### Welcome to the Boson framework page

The Boson framework is an effort to bring some innovations from the Go language to C++ regarding its features for tackling concurrency problems. 

The project is in a early stage and is still a proof of concept. Head to the [examples](https://github.com/duckie/boson/tree/master/src/examples/src) to discover a little about the current API.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
